names.pinyin: xiang you jia yu biao san
names.hanzi: sesame oil and bladder fish powder
names.commonEnglish: Sesame Oil and Bladder Fish Powder

actions: Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood, extinguishes Wind, and moistens and lubricates the Intestines and Lungs.
Nourishes Yin, subdues Yang, nourishes the Liver and Kidneys, stops bleeding, dissipates Blood Stasis and resolves swelling.

syndromes: Esophageal cancer due to Kidney and Liver Yin Deficiency with Blood Stagnation

symptoms: Low back and knees sore and painful
A localized pricking sensation in the chest and back
Women: Irregular menses or Scanty menses or Amenorrhea Vaginal discharge
manifestations.tongue: Red or Dark blue or red with echymoses
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Deep, sluggish and choppy or Choppy and uneven

notes: Fry the fish in boiling sesame oil until yellow, remove the air bladder and grind into a fine powder. Take 5g three times a day.
